intro: This Privacy Policy explains how DynoPay ("we", "us", "our") collects, uses, and protects your information when you use our website, dashboard, or API ("the Service").

section1Info.details: Email, name, company details, and login credentials.

section1Info.title: Usage Data:
section1Info.details: Logs, device/browser information, IP address, interactions with the dashboard and API.

section1Info.title: Transaction Metadata:
section1Info.details: Blockchain transaction IDs, wallet addresses you choose to connect, payment requests you generate.

section1Footer: (We never access or control your private keys or funds.)
